data.text:
@TT65595765 Hi, TT. We apologize for the inconvenience and we understand your sentiments regarding this. 

We've already requested for a follow up with our handling team. We'll let you know once we have updates.
@azeabustan Hi, Nanay From The Metro! Yes, we suggest to secure EMIS forms for both your flights, just to make sure you have it ready for both departure dates :)
@Enha72668882 Hi, Enha. We’ve taken note of this feedback, and what we can assure you is that we are looking into this matter. Thank you.

@McNameface Hi, Namey. We're truly sorry to hear this. We'll have your reported experience forwarded to the office concerned for their attention and service enhancement. In the meantime, it will be best to approach any of our airport staff for further assistance.

@Cristin84284428 Hi, Cristina. We're truly sorry to hear this. We certainly have no intention to cause you any disservice. We've tried sending you a dm but we are unable to do so. Kindly check your settings so we can look into this.
@tsinoysibini Got it, Vince.
@ohlikethedeer We have sent you a dm, Tabitha.
@ohlikethedeer Hi, Tabitha. You may put a space instead of the hyphen while booking. :) In your example, you may indicate Jean Mitchel.
@iamt0n11 Hi, iamt0n1. We're truly sorry to hear this. We'll send you a dm so we can look into this.
@AweSAMpyo See you, Sam! ❤
@AweSAMpyo We miss you too, Sam! We look forward in seeing you onboard soon! 😊

@withelights_on Hi, Joyce! Flight availability may vary based on operational requirements, so it's hard to say when we will have direct routes to/from these cities. We hope you still keep us in mind for your future travel, we look forward in seeing you onboard! :)

Kindly stay tuned for updates!

@GeorgePutong Hi, George. Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to know that your parents enjoyed their flight with us. We hope for your continued valuable support and patronage in our flag carrier. ❤✈
@Raft3r Hi Raft3r. We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.
@_attynikkipilar Your safety is our priority, Nikki. Thank you for choosing Philippine Airlines!
@BorryNgog Hi, Borry. The maximum allowable dimensions for check-in baggage is 62 inches / 158 cm. Thus, your items should not be considered as oversized based on the dimensions you've provided.
@TT65595765 Hi! We're sorry to hear about this. We've sent you a DM for us to assist you further on your concern regarding Mabuhay Miles.

@OesiAussie Hi, @OesiAussie! We're glad to hear about your experience! :) We're always happy to help as well and we look forward in seeing you on board again soon! 

Maraming salamat! ❤

urls.title: CHANGES IN PAL’S MANILA (NAIA) TERMINALS
urls.description: Starting December 01, 2022, Philippine Airlines flights to and from the United States, Guam and Doha (Qatar) will depart from and arrive at Terminal 1 of Manila’s Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA).

Each flight ticket has its own Free Baggage Allowance (FBA) policy. This Free Baggage Allowance (FBA) entitlement is valid only on that

data.text: @isayerss (2/2) Nonetheless, what we are working on is communicating with airport authorities to make digital payments widely available for our passengers. As of writing, some of the airport concessionaires now accept credit card and GCash payments.
@isayerss (1/2) Thank you for your feedback, Philippian. These airport concessionaires are under Manila International Airport Authority and are not controlled by Philippine Airlines.

data.text: @kheemchi Hello, Kheem. Your manual wheelchair can be checked in as baggage if it folds to within a space of 13 inches by 36 inches by 42 inches without the need to remove or disassemble any part of it. Thank you.
@alcksg Hi, A. We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.
@FigtherTotong Hi, @FigtherTotong. May we know your concern?
@mrm24 Hello, NolRAM. We are sorry to hear this. May we know your flight number and flight date so we can submit a report regarding your reported experience? Thank you.
@druesome_ Hello, Andrew. We are sorry to hear this this. We have sent you a DM so we can help you with your concern. Thank you.
@alcksg Hi, A. We're trying to send you a DM to assist you further with this. May we ask you to follow us so we may be able to send you a message?

@mazel_cer (2/2) Once you have successfully booked a flight, you may send us another message with a copy of the infant's birth certificate/passport and ticket number, so we can endorse it to our team for correction. Thank you.

@mazel_cer (1/2) Sorry for the booking error, Mary. Our system currently has a character limit for passengers with infants. For now, kindly shorten the name of the infant until the system accepts the booking.
@mazel_cer We're truly sorry to hear this, Mary. May we clarify if you are receiving an error prompt?
@julesguiang Hi, Jules. We've responded. Kindly check.
